name: Crowne Plaza Kuwait City

reviews.text: Excellent service and an amazing interior.
reviews.title: If only..

reviews.text: The restaurants here were beyond amazing.
reviews.title: Ok for a business travel stop over (1-2 day max)

reviews.text: Its such a shame there is no alcohol.
reviews.title: Excellent Staff. Lots of restaurant choices

reviews.text: A basic to stay when on business. Probably not the greatest place to stay for a vacation but then, Kuwait is probably not the most attractive place to go on vacation.
reviews.title: A great place to recuperate ....

reviews.text: The staff and facilities are excellent. I recommend the italian and Lebanese restaurants. The hotel gym facility is excellent. Big weight room and cardio room.
reviews.title: Solid Effort By Crowne Plaza Staff

reviews.text: After a long, grueling trip to Kuwait, the Crowne Plaza was a welcoming oasis of comfortable surroundings and friendly staff. The guest room was large and provided all of the amenities I would need. The Crowne Plaza has even gone the extra mile to supply free wireless service that is reliable and has enough bandwidth to get work done.
reviews.title: Truly Full Service

reviews.text: There are several different restaurants in the hotel and all that I tried produced good, tasty meals. I would recommend the Japanese restaurant above the others that I patronized. The breakfast buffet had a wide variety of items, including freshly made omelettes.
reviews.title: This is the BEST!

reviews.text: The Crowne Plaza is quite close to Kuwait International Airport, which makes it a convenient stopover point for short stays in the city. The only downside is that there aren't really any other restaurants or shops in the area, but the hotel is pretty self-sufficient for most travelers' needs.
reviews.title: Excellent - Friendly and Welcoming

reviews.text: In the event that I return to Kuwait, the Crowne Plaza would be my first choice in hotels.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel in Kuwait

reviews.text: My first visit to Kuwait was in mid-June, 2010. Since then I have visited Kuwait 3 more times, the most recent December 2011. My hotel of choice is the Crowne Plaza! I have never seen an entire hotel staff go beyond all norms to ensure my stay was pleasant, comfortable, and truly memorable. Service in the restaurant was great, the Lounge Coordinator was terrific, Housekeeping was excellent, and the Front Desk staff were genuine in their desire to ensure my stay was a great experience. The rooms were the cleanest I've seen, all anemities (TV, bath, morning newspaper, free breakfast, etc.) were flawless. I will again stay at the Crowne 6-17 Feb 2012 and am very much looking forward to another fantastic experience!
reviews.title: Best Hotel in Kuwait

reviews.text: I stayed for 1 night on business trip. I liked the hotel, the services and the staff. The room, the furniture, the details...everything was just excellent.
reviews.title: Excellent - Business Trip

reviews.text: WiFi all over the hotel for free. Nice swimming pool, good location..Close to the airport.
reviews.title: An excellent venue!!

reviews.text: Very helpful and accommodating staff. I had a very minor issue before checking out, and I was in hurry..A lady from the staff handled that very effectively. professionally and nicely. You know, when you keep travelling, you get to be forgotten sometimes., and you get to lose the attention of people..The way I was treated made my day..and a tough day it was.
reviews.title: very good service

reviews.text: So thank you, as I don't want to mention names...
reviews.title: You really don't have to ever leave...

reviews.text: I really enjoyed my stay at the Crown Plaza Hotel earlier this month. It has been a few years since my last stay and the improvements they have made to the pool area and new Spa are most impressive.
reviews.title: Kuwait Crown Plaza for business

reviews.text: The hotel is very good.
reviews.title: Good staying

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Facilies in the room are very nice, for example dvd player and bose hi-fi in the room.
reviews.title: Good hotel but not the best

reviews.text: Unfortunately the location is not so good, is near the airport, so outside the hotel there is almost nothing, moreover a Kuwaiti-friend tell me that area is dangerous for foreigners (robbery).
reviews.title: Can't say enough

reviews.text: Anyway I had more than one month very pleasure stay, restaurant are very good inside the hotel and very wide choice, SPA is very nice as well.
reviews.title: Well Trained Staff
Enjoyable Stay 31st October
reviews.text: Only weak point is about organisation... every morning for more than one month I had to ask to the waitress for coffee spoon at breakfast (just as example), or often I ask a transport for certain time and there was some delay.

description: Crowne Plaza Kuwait is the authentic urban resort and business hotel in Kuwait. We are conveniently located within 20 minutes from the major government & corporate offices, and only 5 minutes to Avenues, 360 Shopping Mall and Golf Club. Kuwait International Airport is only a 5-minute drive away. Business and leisure travelers alike will appreciate the lush grounds and the prestigious High ways in which you will find many experiences to last a lifetime. Enjoy the largest free-form swimming pool. Crowne Plaza Kuwait offers 300 guestrooms with a variety of Pool view, suites and club floor rooms. Hotel is equipped to host business meetings & social gatherings with eighteen flexible function rooms, and three grand ballrooms that accommodates up to 500 guests. 24-hour business centre with high-speed Internet access and Free Wi-Fi in all the guest rooms and meeting rooms that make doing business a snap. We offer eight restaurants serving International cuisine, Italian, iranian, Japanese, Middle Eastern, Far Eastern, American and seafood specialties. The renowned Spa and health Club invites guests to a variety of marvelous experiences with outstanding recreational facilities including a 24-hour gym, tennis, squash, swimming pools and numerous massage treatments.
